channel.title: Comments on: Futuristic Adventures in Audio

item.title: By: chickpea
item.dc:creator: chickpea
item.description:
Some audio links for the curious minds and eager ears:
http://thecircleda.com/2012/09/25/show-59-the-free-association-collective/
Download the copyleft (free to download and share) audiobook version of “Moments of Excess” by going to the following website: http://archive.org/details/Audiobook-TheFreeAssociation-MomentsOfExcess-June2012
You can find out more about the Free Association on their website: http://freelyassociating.org/
And more about Dissident Island Radio here: http://www.dissidentisland.org/
-chickpea
item.content:encoded:
Some audio links for the curious minds and eager ears:

http://thecircleda.com/2012/09/25/show-59-the-free-association-collective/

Download the copyleft (free to download and share) audiobook version of “Moments of Excess” by going to the following website:
http://archive.org/details/Audiobook-TheFreeAssociation-MomentsOfExcess-June2012

You can find out more about the Free Association on their website:
http://freelyassociating.org/

And more about Dissident Island Radio here:
http://www.dissidentisland.org/

-chickpea
